tags: Get the details of all the branches of a bank

200.description: The list of branches of the bank retrieved successfully.

parameters.name: bank_id
parameters.description: The bank identifier.To try out the demo API,use bank_id as 'bank-4020-01'.

get.summary: Get the list of branches of OBank
get.description: This API will expose branches information of OBank.

tags: Get the details of all atms owned by a bank

200.description: The list of ATMs of the bank retrieved successfully.

parameters.name: bank_id
parameters.description: The bank identifier.To try out the demo API,use bank_id as 'bank-4020-01'.

get.description: This API will expose ATMs information of OBank.

tags: Get the details of atms owned by a bank in a given country

200.description: The list of ATMs of the bank by country retrieved successfully.

parameters.name: bank_id
parameters.description: The bank identifier.To try out the demo API,use bank_id as 'bank-4020-01'.

parameters.name: country_id
parameters.description: The country identifier which is 2 charactor long.To tryout the demo API,use the country_id as 'ES' which will list Spain located ATMs information.

get.summary: Get the ATMS of OBank in a country
get.description: This API will expose the ATMs information of OBank by a particular country..

tags: Get the details of the products supported by a bank

200.description: The list of products supported by the bank retrieved successfully.

parameters.name: bank_id
parameters.description: The bank identifier.To try out the demo API,use bank_id as 'bank-4020-01'.

get.description: Get the products which are supported by OBank.For eg: Fixed deposits,current accounts,loan schemes,etc.

tags: Get the details of a particular product supported by a bank

200.description: The details of specific product provided by the bank retrieved successfullly.

parameters.name: bank_id
parameters.description: The bank identifier.To try out the demo API,use bank_id as 'bank-4020-01'.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: The product identifier.For example- In this sample API,'SME loans' product will be identified as 'sme-loans' and 'Personal Current Account' type will identified as 'pcAccounts'

get.summary: Get details of a product provides by OBank
get.description: Get details of a specific product provides by OBank

info.title: OpenBankAPI
info.description: This API exposes open data of a bank such as the branch locations, ATM locations, and supporting products.
